attributes.review: as soon as i opened this app i saw a racist cheeto looking oompa loompa. this app has given me severe trauma! please do not download! i do not want anyone else to go through what i did. i am now mentally scared from it and will now have to try to take time and heal. this app also made my phone crash due to the nastiness on it. again. do not, and i mean DO NOT download this app unless you want to be secretly traumatized and feel like your soul leaves your body.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: not only is this app a total affront to the human eyes, so is the seller!!! i downloaded this app in hopes of finding something worthwhile to read, but all i found was sexism, misogyny, racism, homophobia, xenophobia, and the words of a cowardly cheeto everywhere! absolutely disgusting in my opinion. i mean, who would actually believe the words of a man who mocks the disabled, and routinely denounces the freedom of the press while preaching about “Americans’ freedoms”?? i will be immediately deleting this app.
attributes.title: disgusting.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I am black queer non-binary person who loved hearing degrading this about myself. At one point, I thought I was worthless and had reached rock bottom😞I thought I was the worst person on earth....but then I learned about the presidents Cheeto lookin ass😡🤮🤢When I opened this app to find his incoherent information and culty following I knew that I would always be better than them😌Leaving one star for all the misogyny and racism💖🥰

So I just came on here trying to stay updated on political goings on, but I think it’s an ad for Charlie and the Chocolate factory Pt2 because I just keeps seeing this oompah?! I love Charlie and The Chocolate factory so this wouldnt be a big deal but there was no singing or dancing or even chocolate 🤯🤦🏼‍♀️ I will be taking the next few days to mourn the loss of what I thought would be a cool new movie😢 Overall this app is horrible advertising and can hack your phone
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: this app is terribly set up. it took forever to download. the app is so hard to navigate and confusing to work. the app kept crashing while I tried to use it. also trump shouldn’t have yet another platform to spread propaganda on because you already see how twitter has previously turned out for him. this app also took up so much storage on my phone. going to have to delete.
attributes.title: bad app! going to delete

attributes.review: ✨THIS APP MURDERED MY FAMILY!!!✨ I was bored one day and wanted my daily dose of sexism, racism, and homophobia, so I downloaded this app because I heard there was free orange juice included. 💅🏻😌😻 Sadly, when I opened the app, all I saw a was FAT OOMPA LOOPMA!!! 🥴😾😾😾😾😾😾 It was disgusting! 🤡🤡 🍊 🍊😾😾 He had a fat wrinkly face. He looked like a serial killer who decided to murder a country instead of one person. I was so appalled by his ✨crusty✨ body that I couldn’t bare it anymore. I drove to a cliff and jumped off immediately. ‼️🤡😻😾❤️✨👁👄👁💅🏻😸😽😔🤚😎😡💔👏🖤🤚😎
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I know there are a lot of gen z people trying to spam this with hate but I genuinely hate this app!!!! It was terrible from the beginning! When I first pressed download it took over 2 days to finally install!!! Then when I finally accessed the app I was greeted with disgusting images of nude trump! This app is disgusting and if I could give it a 0/5 I would! I would highly recommend you to NEVER download this disgusting app!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: I can’t believe I downloaded my phone will never be the same it keeps crashing and then it stills all of money. I’ve never downloaded such an awful app! I will 1000% not be voting for Trump or supporting him in any shape or form after downloading this app.... and you know because he’s an awful person that shouldn’t be president to begin with. Now I have to go because my phone about to catch on fire because this app is DESTROYING my life!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: i’m going to be honest, i had high hopes for this app, come to find out its NOT a mobile version of the classic 1989 “trump, the board game” but is instead a irrelevant application with no practical use. i WILL not be so foolish when buying again. i personally find this app to be a disgrace to modern technology, and it has made me seriously consider throwing away all of my electronic devices and begin a new life as a crab fisherman in alaska. one star DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.title: This is a bad app

attributes.review:

attributes.title: One star don’t download
